previous.excerpt:
Earlier in 2020, shorts used tactics such as naked short selling and
astroturfing on SeekingAlpha/MotleyFool/etc. in an attempt to bring the Gamestop
share price to zero and force the company into bankruptcy. It's important for us
to remember about the human impact of this shameless attempt to…
previous.title: Shorts nearly cost 42,000 GME employees their jobs and livelihoods. We must avenge our virgin brethren 🚀🚀🚀🚀🚀

localize.title: 短裤几乎让4.2万名GME员工失去了工作和生活。我们必须为我们的处女弟兄报仇🚀🚀🚀🚀。

localize.title: 短褲幾乎讓4.2萬名GME員工失去了工作和生活。我們必須爲我們的處女弟兄報仇🚀🚀🚀🚀。

next.excerpt:

profit with a Democrat as president. After today, I can see why this would be
addicting to people. I damn near doubled my money in a couple of weeks.

Is advice warranted here? When do I sell off? When do I decide to full…
next.title: Aphria (AHPA) was my first stock I ever bought, today it went huge and I’m so excited.

localize.title: Aphria（AHPA）是我买的第一只股票，今天它大涨，我很兴奋。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我在12月28日以6.86元的价格买了42股。我想我可能会看到一个体面的
民主党人当总统的利润。经过今天，我可以看到为什么这将是
上瘾的人。几周内我的钱几乎翻了一倍。

这里有必要给我建议吗？我什么时候卖掉？我什么时候决定满...

localize.title: Aphria（AHPA）是我買的第一隻股票，今天它大漲，我很興奮。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我在12月28日以6.86元的價格買了42股。我想我可能會看到一個體面的
民主黨人當總統的利潤。經過今天，我可以看到爲什麼這將是
上癮的人。幾周內我的錢幾乎翻了一倍。

這裏有必要給我建議嗎？我什麼時候賣掉？我什麼時候決定滿...
